tool_description: Analyzes potential radio frequency interference from existing transmitters and evaluates interference risks for proposed network sites.

coverage_radius_km.description: Coverage radius from RF Coverage Predictor

error_messages: Invalid coordinates: Latitude must be between -90 and 90, longitude between -180 and 180.
Invalid frequency: Frequency must be between 700 and 6000 MHz.
Invalid transmit power: Power must be between 1 and 1000 watts.
Invalid coverage radius: Must be a positive number.
Interference database unavailable: Unable to access interference database for analysis.
Frequency coordination required: Detected potential interference requiring coordination.
usage: Provide site coordinates and RF specifications from RF Coverage Predictor. The tool checks for potential interference and coordination requirements.

interference_risk.description: Interference risk level: low, medium, high

nearby_transmitters.description: Number of nearby transmitters on similar frequencies
